UserAccount.title: User Account
UserAccount.description: Represents a user's account within the TON Gift Marketplace.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account, matching Firebase Auth UID.

NftGift.title: NFT Gift
NftGift.description: Represents an NFT gift owned by a user or listed on the marketplace/auction.

ownerId.description: Firebase Auth UID of the owner.

WithdrawalRequest.title: Withdrawal Request
WithdrawalRequest.description: Represents a user's request to withdraw an NFT to their Telegram account.

userId.description: The Firebase UID of the user making the request.

telegramUsername.description: The user's Telegram username to send the gift to.

nftId.description: The ID of the NFT being withdrawn.

nftName.description: The name of the NFT for easy identification.

status.description: The status of the withdrawal request.

requestedAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was made.

definition.description: Stores all data for a single user, including their profile and settings. The document ID must match the Firebase Auth UID.
Stores the NFT gifts that a user owns in their inventory. This is a subcollection of the user's document.
Stores all currently active auctions. The document ID is the same as the NFT ID.
Stores all withdrawal requests made by users. Processed manually by the site owner.
